ing: 1 cup water, divided, or as needed
1/2 cup ice, divided, or as needed
1/2 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
1/4 cup mixed salad greens, or to taste
6 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
des: "This is one of the drink recipes I give to my clients when they want to detox."
ins: Pour 2 fluid ounces water and drop 3 ice cubes into a blender; add ginger and cinnamon. Layer celery, apple, cucumber, kale, spinach, mixed greens, and mint leaves, respectively, in blender. Blend mixture until smooth. Add more water and ice to reach desired consistency.
